DescriptionOfIncident: Updated: Genesis Crafty recalls Cheese Scones (4 pack) due to incorrect allergy labelling
RiskToConsumers: Mustard, soya. This product contains mustard and soya making it a possible health risk for anyone with an allergy to mustard and/or soya.

DescriptionOfIncident: Unilever recalls Ben & Jerry?s Chunky Monkey Non-Dairy Ice Cream due to undeclared nuts and soya
RiskToConsumers: Nuts and soya. This product contains nuts and soya making it a possible health risk for anyone with an allergy to nuts and/or soya.

DescriptionOfIncident: Kallo Foods recalls Whole Earth 3 Nut Butter as allergenic ingredients are not declared in English
RiskToConsumers: Peanuts, Pecan nuts, walnuts and other nuts. This product contains peanuts, pecan nuts and walnuts and may contain traces of other nuts making it a possible health risk for anyone with an allergy to peanuts and/or, pecan nuts and/or walnuts and other nuts.

RiskToConsumers: Oats (gluten). This product contains oats (gluten) making it a possible health risk for anyone with an allergy or intolerance to oats or gluten.

RiskToConsumers: Milk. This product contains milk making it a possible health risk for anyone with an allergy or intolerance to milk or milk constituents.

RiskToConsumers: Nuts (hazelnuts, almonds) and milk. This product contains hazelnuts, almonds and milk making it a possible health risk for anyone with an allergy to nuts and/or an allergy or intolerance to milk or milk constituents.

DescriptionOfIncident: The Jordans & Ryvita Company recalls Dorset Cereals Simply Oat Granola because of undeclared nuts
RiskToConsumers: Nuts. This product contains almond, cashew nuts and hazelnuts making it a possible health risk for anyone with an allergy to nuts.

DescriptionOfIncident: Tony?s Kitchen recalls various products due to allergen issues
RiskToConsumers: Crustaceans, molluscs, barley (gluten), wheat (gluten), celery, fish, nuts, peanuts, mustard, sesame, egg, milk, sulphur dioxides and soya.. These products may contain barley (gluten), wheat (gluten), crustaceans, molluscs, celery, fish, peanuts, nuts, mustard, sesame, egg, milk, sulphur dioxides and/or soya, making them a possible health risk for anyone with an allergy to fish, crustaceans, molluscs, celery, nuts, peanuts, mustard, sesame, and soya, or an allergy or intolerance to barley (gluten), wheat (gluten), egg, milk or milk constituents or a sensitivity to sulphur dioxide and/or sulphites.. . Please see attached PDF for the allergens in each affected product.
